sentences.en: Be sure you get your daily quota of calcium.
sentences.cn: 要确保每天的钙摄入量。

sentences.en: Calcium is excreted in the urine and stools.
sentences.cn: 钙通过尿液和粪便排出体外。

sentences.en: Calcium is found most abundantly in milk.
Calcium may aid in the prevention of colon cancer.
sentences.cn: 钙可能有助于预防结肠癌。
钙和水会发生化学反应。

sentences.en: Dairy source of protein and calcium.
sentences.cn: 奶牛的蛋白质来源和钙。

sentences.en: If you don't take milk, cheese or yoghurt, other sources of calcium are important.
sentences.cn: 你要是不喝鲜奶和酸奶，也不吃乳酪，那么其他的补钙来源就很重要了。

sentences.en: Like fibre, calcium binds with fat molecules and helps flush them out through the intestine.
sentences.cn: 像纤维、钙可以和脂肪分子结合，帮助他们彻底的通过肠道。

sentences.en: Milk products are an excellent source of calcium and protein.
sentences.cn: 奶制品富含钙与蛋白质。

sentences.en: Now this machine gives us such high resolution that we can see very small specks of calcium.
sentences.cn: 现在这台机器可以呈现很高的分辨率，我们可以看见非常小的钙微粒。

sentences.en: Strongly acid peat soils are often low in calcium.
sentences.cn: 强酸性泥炭土常呈现低钙.

sentences.en: They may be exacerbated by a simultaneous deficiency of calcium.
sentences.cn: 由于同时缺乏钙而使之恶化.

sentences.en: This leads to calcium deposition in the blood-vessels.
sentences.cn: 这导致钙在血管中沉积。

sentences.en: To dig calcium into the soil, he warned, does not help the plant.
sentences.cn: 他告诫说，翻土掺钙并不利于植物生长。

sentences.en: Vitamin D is necessary to aid the absorption of calcium from food.
sentences.cn: 从食物中吸取钙需靠维生素D的帮助。

sentences.en: We need calcium to make bones.
What you eat and drink, from childhood on, is critical to the amount of calcium in your bones.
sentences.cn: 从儿童时期起你吃的和喝的东西对于你的骨骼里的钙质量就有重大的影响。

sentences.en: Zemel says that when calcium levels are low, the body releases a hormone that helps squeeze the most out of every available milligram of the mineral.
sentences.cn: 泽莫尔博士说,当人体中的钙含量偏低时, 身体里就会产生一种荷尔蒙,它能帮助肌体最大限度地吸收所摄入的钙.

trans.tran_en: a silver-white metal that helps to form teeth, bones, and  chalk  . It is a chemical  element  : symbol Ca
